page.title: 02THE OPEN MARKET-WIRKSWORTH 1
page.content: THERE ARE USUALLY ABOUT 20 STALLS EACH TUESDAY. WE INTERVIEWED THE STALL HOLDERS TO FIND OUT WHAT THEY SELL, WHERE THEY LIVE AND HOW OFTEN THEY HAVE A STALL AT WIRKSWORTH. 4 STALLS SOLD CLOTHES 2 STALLS SOLD HOUSEHOLD GOODS 2 STALLS SOLD FRUIT AND VEG. 2 STALLS SOLD GROCERIES 1 STALL FOR EACH OF THE FOLLOWING: MEAT, FISH, PLANTS,WOOL, FABRICS, BAGS, BRIC-A-BRAC, PET FOODS, CARDS, GLASS AND ELECTRICAL ITEMS. STALLHOLDERS WHO LIVE IN TOWN-2 WITHIN 5 MILES -3 WITHIN 10 MILES -6 MORE THAN 10 MILES AWAY -9 STALLHOLDERS HERE EVERY WEEK -17 OFTEN -2 ONLY OCCASIONALLY-1
